message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $6500 is a bit lower than my initial price, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $7500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $7500 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $6000 is still a bit lower than my desired price, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I can sell the product to you for $7200. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $7200 is still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $6500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hi Bob, I understand your offer of $6500 is still a bit lower than my desired price, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can sell the product to you for $7000. What do you think?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not quite there. I'd like to make one more offer. I'm willing to pay $6800 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?

Hi Bob, I understand you're close to your budget, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $7000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $7000 and $6800. I can sell the product to you for $6900. What do you think?
